Articles.Content:
So, i was doing some junk in KSP and i was using the IX-6315 "Dawn" Electric Propulsion Engine

and i wondered: "why not have a 1.25m ion engine(and a more powerful one)?

so i copied the file from Gamedata and do some stuff,change the size,price,Max thrust, fuel consumption, and stuff (and the name!dont forget the name)

Then i played KSP and i realised the Dawn(the ion engine) was not there.

please help! i want my Dawn back!(i miss the lil engine)

PS:i am still at 1.0.2 cause i have a fleet going to counquer Jool and its moon.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-26T07:31:32Z" title="06/26/2015 07:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 26, 2015</time> by RandomRyan**
